Description: Allows the government to censor certain expression
Allows search and seizure of private property without reasonable cause

Government.ADICO: [Government][may][search and seize private property without reasonable cause][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Creates oversight body
Creates new agency/regulatory body

Government.ADICO: [Government][must][create new and independent regulator to enforce the law][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Allows search and seizure of private property with warrant

Government.ADICO: [Government][may][search and seize private property with warrant][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Allows creation of regulatory rules in support of a law

Regulator.ADICO: [Regulator][may][enact regulatory rules to adapt to changes in technology and disinformation strategies][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: IS and SM providers must accept data transparency requirements

IS and SM providers.ADICO: [IS and SM providers][must][accept data transparency requirements][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: IS and SM providers deplatforming accounts

IS and SM providers.ADICO: [IS and SM providers][must][deplatform accounts that violate criteria stipulated in the law][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: IS and SM providers must disclose funding and/or accept financial regulations

IS and SM providers.ADICO: [IS and SM providers][must][disclose funding and/or accept financial regulations][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Licensing IS and SM providers

IS and SM providers.ADICO: [IS and SM providers][must][obtain operational license in addition to formal registration before it can operate][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: IS and SM provider oversight

IS and SM providers.ADICO: [IS and SM providers][must][register and accept oversight from the government][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Suppressing/prevent dissemination of certain types of expression through its platform

Description: IS and SM providers reporting information

IS and SM providers.ADICO: [IS and SM providers][must][report certain information to the government][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Press must disclose funding and/or accept financial regulations

Description: Licensing press

Press.ADICO: [Press][must][obtain operational license in addition to formal registration before it can operate][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Press oversight

Press.ADICO: [Press][must][register and accept oversight from the government][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Press must report information

Press.ADICO: [Press][must][report certain information to the government][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Citizens may appeal to non-regulator

Citizens.ADICO: [Citizens][may][appeal to non-regulating body if they feel that the ruling was incorrect][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Citizens may appeal within regulator

Citizens.ADICO: [Citizens][may][appeal within regulator if they feel that the ruling was incorrect][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Expression protected under [type of exemption]

Government.ADICO: [Government][may not][regulate certain type of expression if it is protected within the legislation][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Expression protected under [legislation]

Government.ADICO: [Government][may not][regulate certain type of expression if it is protected via separate legislation][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]

Description: Civil action

Citizens.ADICO: [Citizens][may][take civil action if they feel that the ruling was incorrect][AATAUAC][or else institutional sanction]
